resources.string: Throws per round: 2 Total amount of throws: %1$d

• Six dice are rolled once to start each round.
• Re-roll any number of dice up to two more times.
• After your second roll, pick how to score.
• A game has 10 rounds, up to 30 rolls total.

• The game automatically starts the first roll after each round.
• Press dice to mark them for re-rolling.
• Groups are created by selecting one or more dice after the last roll.
• Each group needs to be saved individually, press the lock-button after you've selected a group.
